item.description:
Chef Lorena Autuori from the Italian Cooking School ‘Percorsi con Gusto’ is back in Boston!

http://www.percorsicongusto.com/

After the successful events of last Christmas, including cooking lessons and a ‘Typical Umbrian Dinner’ at Olive’s with celebrity chef Todd English, and after requests from the community, Lorena is back to share her magic in the kitchen.

If you are interested in joining a group of between 30-35 people that have already signed up for this 'Traditional Easter Lunch - Umbrian-style', then you may be interested in coming to Filippo's restaurant in the North End on Easter Sunday at 1:00. That information is included at the bottom of this page.

(TRADITIONAL UMBRIAN EASTER LUNCH) - Sunday, March 31 (1:00)

• Easter lunch takes place @ Filippo’s in the North End - 283 Causeway St. (Boston)

- Easter omelette

- White lasagna

- Lamb with artichokes

- Crescionda cake

- Wine included with lunch

Total cost - $55

 

For further information about this event, including how to sign up and how to pay, please contact John Jordan:

italianprogram@gmail.com

(617) 233-9876

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: SOLD OUT! Traditional Umbrian Easter Lunch @ Filippo's Restaurant
